34 /* Title : low_pass_filter.cpp
35  * Project : moveit_servo
36  * Created : 1/11/2019
37  * Author : Andy Zelenak
38  */
39 
40 #include <moveit_servo/low_pass_filter.h>
41 #include <cmath>
42 #include <string>
43 #include <ros/ros.h>
44 
45 namespace moveit_servo
46 {
47 namespace
48 {
49 constexpr char LOGNAME[] = "low_pass_filter";
50 constexpr double EPSILON = 1e-9;
51 } // namespace
52 
53 LowPassFilter::LowPassFilter(double low_pass_filter_coeff)
54  : previous_measurements_{ 0., 0. }
55  , previous_filtered_measurement_(0.)
56  , scale_term_(1. / (1. + low_pass_filter_coeff))
57  , feedback_term_(1. - low_pass_filter_coeff)
58 {
59  // guarantee this doesn't change because the logic below depends on this length implicity
60  static_assert(LowPassFilter::FILTER_LENGTH == 2, "moveit_servo::LowPassFilter::FILTER_LENGTH should be 2");
61 
62  ROS_ASSERT_MSG(!std::isinf(feedback_term_), "%s: outputs from filter will be inf because feedback term is inf",
63  LOGNAME);
64  ROS_ASSERT_MSG(!std::isinf(scale_term_), "%s: outputs from filter will be inf because denominator of scale is 0",
65  LOGNAME);
66  ROS_ASSERT_MSG(low_pass_filter_coeff >= 1., "%s: Filter coefficient < 1. makes the lowpass filter unstable", LOGNAME);
67 
68  if (std::abs(feedback_term_) < EPSILON)
69  {
70  ROS_WARN_STREAM_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Filter coefficient value of " << low_pass_filter_coeff
71  << " resulted in feedback term of 0. "
72  " This results in a window averaging Finite "
73  "Impulse Response (FIR) filter with a gain of "
74  << scale_term_ * LowPassFilter::FILTER_LENGTH);
75  }
76 }
77 
78 void LowPassFilter::reset(double data)
79 {
80  previous_measurements_[0] = data;
81  previous_measurements_[1] = data;
82 
83  previous_filtered_measurement_ = data;
84 }
85 
86 double LowPassFilter::filter(double new_measurement)
87 {
88  // Push in the new measurement
89  previous_measurements_[1] = previous_measurements_[0];
90  previous_measurements_[0] = new_measurement;
91 
92  double new_filtered_measurement = scale_term_ * (previous_measurements_[1] + previous_measurements_[0] -
93  feedback_term_ * previous_filtered_measurement_);
94 
95  // Store the new filtered measurement
96  previous_filtered_measurement_ = new_filtered_measurement;
97 
98  return new_filtered_measurement;
99 }
100 } // namespace moveit_servo
